verses.text: At the conclusion of this teaching, Jesus withdrew from Galilee, and went into that district of Judea which is on the other side of the Jordan.
Great crowds followed him, and he cured them there.
Presently some Pharisees came up to him, and, to test him, said, “Has a man the right to divorce his wife for every cause?”

“Haven’\+w t|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3754"\+w* read,”replied Jesus, “\+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w at|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* beginning \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w Creator|strong="G2936"\+w* ‘\+w made|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* male \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w female|strong="G2338"\+w*,’
